entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Vancouver
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:07 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, 0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vancouver Int'l Airport 01:00 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023
Condition: Snow
Temperature: 0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 0.3°C
Wind: E 22 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to snow at times heavy this evening. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of hail in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the water in the morning. Wind becoming light near noon. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 70 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
